name: Beds24
tag_list: online-booking-system, online-booking-system-hotel, online-booking-system-lodging, online-booking-system-bed-and-breakfast-, booking-engine, booking-system, online-booking-engine, channel-management, channel-manager, hotel-software, inn-software, availabi
overview:
Beds24.com online booking system is a cloud based service providing commission free and powerful online booking engines, property management and channel management.

The system includes a selection of customisable booking widgets and availability calendars for websites and blogs and a Facebook App. A plugin for Wordpress is also available.

Key Features inlcude a multi-language booking page, the option to sell tours, events or extras and the collection of deposit or credit card details. Support and setup are free.

Beds24.com is suitable for most type of accommodation such as B&B’s, hotels, motels, hostels, vacation rentals, holiday homes and campgrounds and for booking agents and marketing associations.

milestones.description: We have created a plugin for WordPress sites to show a Beds24.com booking page and booking widgets directly in WordPress pages.
milestones.source_description: Beds24 Online Booking Plugin for WordPress
